demo.text: This is a simple demonstration app for ngx-translate
demo.title: Translation demo

icu.pluralization: There {count, plural, =0{is no apple} one{is one apple} other{there are several apples}}.
icu.select: {gender, select, male{He uses} female{She uses} other{They use}} {product}

numberOfNewMessages: You have {count, plural, =0{no new messages} =1{one new message} other{{count} new messages}}.
